  Example Usage

# f5distributedcloud_user (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_user` data source retrieves information about an existing user.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_user" "example" {
  name      = "my-user"
  namespace = "system"
}

output "email" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_user.example.email
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the user to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the user is located.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the user.
- `email` (String) Email address of the user.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the user.
